page.title: 06TRANSPORT-SPETCHLEY DISTRICT
page.content: There is only one local{bus}service, the 350/351,which runs at half hourly intervals on Wednesdays and Saturdays. This is operated by the Midland Red West Bus Company and runs from Worcester through Churchill to Redditch.{ The{M5}currently under a reconstruction and road widening scheme, runs from North to South down the west side of our area. There are no interchanges until the parish of Whittington is reached,(Junction 7) The Birmingham to Cheltenham{railway {line}runs North to South through our grid. The former GWR Worcester station was at Spetchley crossroads and passengers entered Worcester by carriage from the station along Spetchley road. Recent plans to re-establish a station at Spetchley received little support.
